languages.text: Кибелла утверждает, что яростный и бесстрашный дух пилота не покинул останки и не отправился к Неумирающему. Она предлагает почтить героя и украсить его костями нос флагмана, чтобы мертвец и дальше мог сражаться с врагами человечества.

Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.
languages.original_text: Кибелла утверждает, что яростный и бесстрашный дух пилота не покинул останки и не отправился к Неумирающему. Она предлагает почтить героя и украсить его костями нос флагмана, чтобы мертвец и дальше мог сражаться с врагами человечества.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with his bones, so that the dead man may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity.

Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.

languages.text: Kibellah behauptet, der furchtlose Geist des Piloten habe seine sterblichen Überreste noch nicht verlassen, um zum Todlosen zu gehen. Sie schlägt vor, den Helden zu ehren und den Bug des Flaggschiffs mit seinen Knochen zu schmücken, auf dass sie die Feinde der Menschheit auch im Tod bekämpfen können.
languages.original_text: Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah behauptet, der furchtlose Geist des Piloten habe seine sterblichen Überreste noch nicht verlassen, um zum Todlosen zu gehen. Sie schlägt vor, den Helden zu ehren und den Bug des Flaggschiffs mit seinen Knochen zu schmücken, auf dass sie die Feinde der Menschheit auch im Tod bekämpfen können.

languages.text: À en croire Kibellah, l'esprit farouche et intrépide du pilote n'est pas encore parti rejoindre l'Immortel. Elle suggère de rendre hommage au héros et de décorer la proue du vaisseau amiral avec ses os, pour qu'il puisse continuer à combattre les ennemis de l'humanité dans la mort.
languages.original_text: Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.

traits.locale_text: À en croire Kibellah, l'esprit farouche et intrépide du pilote n'est pas encore parti rejoindre l'Immortel. Elle suggère de rendre hommage au héros et de décorer la proue du vaisseau amiral avec ses os, pour qu'il puisse continuer à combattre les ennemis de l'humanité dans la mort.

languages.text: Kibellah afirma que el espíritu fiero e indomable del piloto no ha ido al encuentro del Inmortal. Sugiere honrar al héroe decorando la proa de la nave insignia con sus huesos para que pueda seguir haciendo frente a los enemigos de la Humanidad incluso muerto.
languages.original_text: Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah afirma que el espíritu fiero e indomable del piloto no ha ido al encuentro del Inmortal. Sugiere honrar al héroe decorando la proa de la nave insignia con sus huesos para que pueda seguir haciendo frente a los enemigos de la Humanidad incluso muerto.

languages.text: キベラは、パイロットの獰猛かつ大胆不敵な魂は、不死の者のもとへ行くために亡骸を捨てたわけではないと主張する。彼女は英雄を称え、その骨で旗艦の艦首を飾ることで、死んだ後も人類の敵と戦い続けられるようにしようと提言する。
languages.original_text: Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.

traits.locale_text: キベラは、パイロットの獰猛かつ大胆不敵な魂は、不死の者のもとへ行くために亡骸を捨てたわけではないと主張する。彼女は英雄を称え、その骨で旗艦の艦首を飾ることで、死んだ後も人類の敵と戦い続けられるようにしようと提言する。

languages.text: 绮贝菈声称，这位飞行员的勇猛无畏的灵魂并没有离开遗体，也没有回到不死之神身边。她建议纪念这位英雄，用这位英雄的遗骨装点旗舰的撞角。这样一来，这位英雄就可以继续与人类之敌战斗。
languages.original_text: Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈声称，这位飞行员的勇猛无畏的灵魂并没有离开遗体，也没有回到不死之神身边。她建议纪念这位英雄，用这位英雄的遗骨装点旗舰的撞角。这样一来，这位英雄就可以继续与人类之敌战斗。

languages.text: Kibellah, pilotun vahşi ve korkusuz ruhunun kalıntılardan ayrılmayıp Ölmeyen'e kavuşmadığını iddia ediyor. Sonrasında kahramanı onurlandırmayı ve İnsanlığın düşmanlarıyla ölümüne savaşmaya devam edebilmeleri için sancak gemisinin pruvasını kemikleriyle süslemeyi teklif ediyor.
languages.original_text: Kibellah claims that the pilot's fierce and fearless spirit has not departed the remains to go to the Undying One. She proposes to honour the hero and decorate the bow of the flagship with their bones, so that they may continue to fight the enemies of Humanity in death.
